title: Is matchmaking currently broken?
body:
Hi there,

recently I've observed a trend in my match history: I usually get matched with and against players with much higher rank than me. Me being ranked Bronze 3 (true elo most likely correct since I play very bad atm but maybe it's like high bronze or low silver since i didn't care much about ranked last season) gets matched with or against silvers (okay, i can get that), golds (maybe I'm better elo than I thought?), Plats, Diamonds and sometimes Masters and Grandmasters. Some games ago I was matched against Mystiques (some former LEC player or something it seems, I'm not to sure about that).
 
Important: These matches are NOT ranked, but normal Draft picks. I don't know if that makes any difference.

So, my questions are: Is that normal? Is it a mess because it's still pre-season? Is matchmaking for normals just like that?

Any answers are welcome.

Cheers.

replies.body:
Deutsches Forum und in Normals hast du eine andere MMR als im Ranked...
Deswegen kannst du da gegen jeden möglichen Gegner spielen!
Ups, merk ich mir fürs nächste mal. Und danke für die Antwort.
